mapper.select: select from synthetic_rewards_list where student_id = #{studentId} and type!=3 and (use_end_time is null or use_end_time>now()) group by name

select count(list.id) count,count(list.use_time) useNumber,list.name name,max(list.use_end_time) endTime ,img_url imgUrl from synthetic_rewards_list list where list.student_id=#{studentId} and type=#{type} and (list.use_end_time > now() or list.use_end_time is null) group by name order by id desc
select count(id) from synthetic_rewards_list where student_id=#{studentId} and name =#{name}
select * from synthetic_rewards_list where student_id=#{studentId} and name=#{name}
mapper.update: update synthetic_rewards_list set use_state=#{useState},use_time=#{useTime},use_end_time=#{useEndTime} where student_id=#{studentId} and name=#{name} and use_state=0
mapper.select: select name ,use_end_time useEndTime from synthetic_rewards_list where student_id=#{studentId} and use_state = 1 and use_end_time is not null and type=#{type} order by use_end_time desc limit 1;
select from synthetic_rewards_list where student_id=#{studentId} and use_end_time>now() and use_state=1 limit 1
select from synthetic_rewards_list where student_id=#{studentId} and use_end_time is null and name=#{name} limit 1
select name where synthetic_rewards_list where student_id=#{studentId} and type=#{type} and (use_end_time is null or use_end_time>now())
